actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To allow individuals to mitigate the financial impact of COVID-19 by taking a one-time distribution of flexible spending arrangement funds in certain plan years, and for other purposes.
short_title: COVID–19 Health and Dependent Care Flexible Spending Account Distribution Act
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text:
COVID-19 Health and Dependent Care Flexible Spending Account Distribution Act

This bill allows a one-time distribution of amounts in a flexible spending arrangement in plan years 2020, 2021, and any plan year during a calendar year in which the President declares a national emergency with respect to COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019)

titles.title: COVID–19 Health and Dependent Care Flexible Spending Account Distribution Act
COVID–19 Health and Dependent Care Flexible Spending Account Distribution Act
To allow individuals to mitigate the financial impact of COVID-19 by taking a one-time distribution of flexible spending arrangement funds in certain plan years, and for other purposes.
